MultiStep_Prompts.prompt: Order a new smartwatch from Amazon and add the delivery date to my Google Calendar

Amazon: orderProduct(user: str, productId: str, quantity: int)
GoogleCalendar: createEvent(user: str, summary: str, description: str, startTime: str, endTime: str)

MultiStep_Prompts.prompt: Send an SMS to Bob Johnson about our meeting tomorrow and then email him the meeting agenda

CommuniLink: sendSMS(user: str, recipient: str, message: str)
Gmail: sendEmail(user: str, to: str, subject: str, body: str)

MultiStep_Prompts.prompt: Create a new note titled 'Project Ideas' in Simple Notes and upload a document 'ProjectPlan.pdf' to my Google Drive

SimpleNotes: createNote(user: str, title: str, content: str)
GoogleDrive: uploadFile(user: str, fileName: str, content: str, parentFolderId: str = None)

MultiStep_Prompts.prompt: Find any unread emails from 'support@amazon.com' and then create a calendar event for 'Call Amazon Support' tomorrow at 10 AM

GoogleCalendar: createEvent(user: str, summary: str, description: str, startTime: str, endTime: str)

MultiStep_Prompts.prompt: Search for 'Bluetooth headphones' on Amazon and add the top result to my wish list
List my upcoming Google Calendar events for the next week and send me an SMS summary of them

GoogleCalendar: listEvents(user: str, timeMin: str, timeMax: str)
CommuniLink: sendSMS(user: str, recipient: str, message: str)

GoogleDrive: createFolder(user: str, folderName: str, parentFolderId: str = None)
SimpleNotes: createNote(user: str, title: str, content: str)

Gmail: sendEmail(user: str, to: str, subject: str, body: str)

Amazon: orderProduct(user: str, productId: str, quantity: int)
SimpleNotes: createNote(user: str, title: str, content: str)

MultiStep_Prompts.prompt: Upload the file 'MeetingNotes.txt' from my computer to Google Drive and then send an email to 'manager@example.com' with a link to the file

GoogleDrive: uploadFile(user: str, fileName: str, content: str, parentFolderId: str = None)
Gmail: sendEmail(user: str, to: str, subject: str, body: str)

MultiTurn_Prompts.prompt: I need to send an email to Sarah regarding the project.

action: readContacts(user: str, name: str)
turn1.response_to_user: What is Sarah's email address or full name?

action: createDraft(user: str, to: str, subject: str, body: str)
turn2.response_to_user: What should be the subject and body of the email?

ground_truth.user2: Subject: Project Update. Body: Hi Sarah, the project is on track. Best, Alice.

action: sendEmail(user: str, to: str, subject: str, body: str)

MultiTurn_Prompts.prompt: Can you help me set a reminder for my doctor's appointment?

turn1.response_to_user: What is the date and time of the appointment, and what should the reminder say?

ground_truth.user1: It's tomorrow at 3 PM. The reminder should say 'Doctor's appointment'

action: createEvent(user: str, summary: str, description: str, startTime: str, endTime: str)
turn2.response_to_user: Reminder set for your doctor's appointment tomorrow at 3 PM.

MultiTurn_Prompts.prompt: I want to create a note about my grocery list.

turn1.response_to_user: What would you like to title the note and what items should I add to the list?

ground_truth.user1: Title it 'Grocery List'. Add milk, eggs, and bread.

action: createNote(user: str, title: str, content: str)
turn2.response_to_user: Note 'Grocery List' created with milk, eggs, and bread.

MultiTurn_Prompts.prompt: I need to upload a document to my Google Drive.

turn1.response_to_user: What is the name of the document and what content should it have? Also, is there a specific folder you'd like to upload it to?

ground_truth.user1: The document is 'MeetingMinutes_2025.txt' and contains the summary of today's meeting. Put it in the 'Meeting Minutes' folder.

action: createFolder(user: str, folderName: str)
uploadFile(user: str, fileName: str, content: str, parentFolderId: str)

MultiTurn_Prompts.prompt: I want to order a new laptop from Amazon.

action: searchProducts(user: str, query: str)
turn1.response_to_user: What kind of laptop are you looking for (e.g., brand, screen size, specifications)?

action: orderProduct(user: str, productId: str, quantity: int)
turn2.response_to_user: Dell XPS 15 ordered. What date should I add to your calendar for delivery?

ground_truth.user2: Please add it for next Tuesday.

action: createEvent(user: str, summary: str, description: str, startTime: str, endTime: str)
turn3.response_to_user: Delivery reminder added to your Google Calendar for next Tuesday.

MultiTurn_Prompts.prompt: Can you text John about the party?

action: getContactDetails(user: str, name: str)
turn1.response_to_user: What is John's phone number or full name?

turn2.response_to_user: What message would you like to send to John?

ground_truth.user2: Tell him the party is at 8 PM.

action: sendSMS(user: str, recipient: str, message: str)
turn3.response_to_user: SMS sent to John: 'The party is at 8 PM.'

MultiTurn_Prompts.prompt: I want to find a specific file in my Google Drive.

turn1.response_to_user: What is the name of the file or any keywords to search for?

action: listFiles(user: str, query: str)
turn2.response_to_user: I found 'FinancialReport.xlsx'. Do you want to open it or share it?

action: openFile(user: str, fileId: str)

MultiTurn_Prompts.prompt: I need to send an email to a new client.

turn1.response_to_user: What is the client's email address, and what should be the subject of the email?

ground_truth.user1: lily.morris7@corp.org, Subject: Welcome to our services.

turn2.response_to_user: What content should I include in the email body?

ground_truth.user2: Welcome to New Company! We look forward to working with you.

action: sendEmail(user: str, to: str, subject: str, body: str)

MultiTurn_Prompts.prompt: Can you help me update an existing note in Simple Notes?

action: getNotes(user: str, query: str)
turn1.response_to_user: What is the title of the note you want to update?

turn2.response_to_user: What updates would you like to make to the note?

ground_truth.user2: Add 'Discussed Q3 results' to the content.

action: updateNote(user: str, noteId: str, updates: dict)

MultiTurn_Prompts.prompt: I want to schedule a meeting with my team next week.

turn1.response_to_user: What day and time should the meeting be, and who should be invited?

ground_truth.user1: Next Monday at 10 AM. Invite Bob and Carol.

action: scheduleMeeting(user: str, attendees: list, time: str, date: str)
createEvent(user: str, summary: str, description: str, startTime: str, endTime: str)
turn2.response_to_user: Meeting scheduled and invitations sent. What should the meeting subject be for the calendar event?

action: updateEvent(user: str, eventId: str, updates: dict)
